means: 耕作(cultivate的过去式和过去分词)
陶冶思想[感情]建立（友谊）

sentence.Network_en: Howe carefully cultivated Daniel C. Roper, the Assistant Postmaster General.
sentence.Network_cn: 豪谨慎地和邮政副部长丹尼尔·C.罗珀拉近关系。

sentence.Network_en: The outburst was inconsistent with the image he has cultivated.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样大发脾气与他所树立的个人形象不相称。

sentence.Network_en: He co-opted many nationalist slogans and cultivated a populist image.
sentence.Network_cn: 他借鉴了很多民族主义标语，建立了一个平民主义者的形象。

entry.tran: 有教养的;有修养的;举止文雅的
entry.def: If you describe someone as cultivated, you mean they are well educated and have good manners.

example.ex: His mother was an elegant, cultivated woman.
example.tran: 他的母亲是一位端庄文雅的女性。

entry.def: Cultivated plants have been developed for growing on farms or in gardens.

example.ex: ...a mixture of wild and cultivated varieties.
example.tran: 野生品种和栽培品种的混作

means.word_mean: 1. (of land or fields) prepared for raising crops by plowing or fertilizing;
2. no longer in the natural state; developed by human care and for human use;
3. marked by refinement in taste and manners;

auth_sentence.content: Most of the cultivated areas are on steep slopes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of the cultivated areas are on steep slopes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of the cultivated areas are on steep slopes.

auth_sentence.content: Islands in the river might be leveed and successfully cultivated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Islands in the river might be leveed and successfully cultivated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Islands in the river might be leveed and successfully cultivated.

auth_sentence.content: The international art-market...is a racket...operated by cultivated smoothies.
auth_sentence.res_content: The international art-market...is a racket...operated by cultivated smoothies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The international art-market...is a racket...operated by cultivated smoothies.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: Many societies throughout history and around the world today have cultivated strong pressures to stay married.

sentences.en: We have a vast expanse of cultivated land.
The wild boar ploughs the earth up like a furrow,and does irreparable damage in the cultivated lands.
sentences.cn: 这只公野猪把土翻得像犁沟似的,给这些耕地造成了不可弥补的损失。

means.word_mean: 培养成的;有教养的;文雅的

sentences.cn: 一个精心塑造的有教养的形象
一位举止非常文雅的女士

sentences.en: These cultivated individuals have been imbued with a sense of social purpose.
sentences.cn: 这些有教养的人满怀着社会责任感。
